Sum of Squares

Source: R/exports.R
sum_squares.Rd

The sum of the squared entries in a vector or matrix.

sum_squares(expr)

Arguments

expr

An Expression, vector, or matrix.

Value

An Expression representing the sum of squares of the input.

Examples

set.seed(212)
m <- 30
n <- 20
A <- matrix(stats::rnorm(m*n), nrow = m, ncol = n)
b <- matrix(stats::rnorm(m), nrow = m, ncol = 1)

x <- Variable(n)
obj <- Minimize(sum_squares(A %*% x - b))
constr <- list(0 <= x, x <= 1)
prob <- Problem(obj, constr)
result <- solve(prob)

result$value

#> [1] 25.64897
result$getValue(x)

#>                [,1]
#>  [1,]  1.019360e-01
#>  [2,]  1.414355e-01
